name: Numbers with no zeros in their base-7 representation.
link: Paolo Xausa, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
xref: Cf. zeroless numbers in other bases: A126646 (base 2), A032924 (base 3), A023705 (base 4), A023721 (base 5), A248910 (base 6), A255805 (base 8), A255808 (base 9), A052382 (base 10).
author: _Paolo Xausa_, Mar 24 2025

name: Numbers with at least one zero in their base-7 representation.
link: Paolo Xausa, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
xref: Cf. analogous sequences in other bases: A062289 (base 2), A081605 (base 3), A196032 (base 4), A382415 (base 5), A382416 (base 6), A382417 (base 8), A382418 (base 9), A011540 (base 10).
